title: Marketing Assistant
job_overview:
Company: Biz Sidekick
Hours: 20 hours/week to start – with rapid growth potential
Location: Remote – NZ Time Zone or Pacific Time overlap preferred

Expertise Required:
• Social Media Management: Plan, post, and engage across LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and more
• Content Creation: Write professional blogs, social captions, short-form articles, and newsletters (Mailchimp)
• Design Savvy: Use Canva (or similar tools) to create reels, carousels, visuals, and event promotions
• Scheduling: Use Hootsuite, Upgrade to see actual info, or other tools to manage content calendars
• Brand Voice: Write clearly and confidently in a professional Kiwi tone – tailored for both corporate and tradie audiences
• Trend Spotting: Stay on top of employment law, HR, and small business news in NZ to inform timely and relevant posts
• Collaboration: Work closely with the team to bring personal brands to life online

The Right Person Is:
• A confident content writer with a strong social media portfolio
• Comfortable working in a remote, flexible environment
• Self-directed and creative, with excellent attention to tone and detail
• Passionate about helping in personal branding and/or small businesses thrive
• Resourceful and responsive to address needs in a timely manner

We’re looking for an assistant who thrives on variety and can confidently support professionals across multiple industries. If you're adaptable, organised, and enjoy working in dynamic environments, this role could be a great fit.
